name: Splunk Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Splunk Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Splunk Enterprise API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Splunk Enterprise API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: search

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many users

searchJobId.name: searchJobId
searchJobId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Job | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Login name of the user | (必填项)

reportId.name: reportId
reportId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Report | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: add_summary_to_metadata (值: None) - Whether to include field summary statistics in the response

search.name: search
search.description: Search language string to execute, in Splunk's Search Processing Language
search.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: Search language string to execute, in Splunk's Search Processing Language | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: realname (值: None) - Full name of the user

sort.name: sort
sort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort | 默认值: {}

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: keyValueMatch (值: None) - Key-value pair to match against. Example: if "Key" is set to `user` and "Field" is set to `john`, only the results where `user` is `john` will be returned.

roles.name: roles
roles.description: Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
roles.natural_language_description: 参数名: Roles | 作用: Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: ['user'] | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: realname (值: None) - Full name of the user
roles (值: None) - Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
